[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [310 000] Gesamtergebnisrechnung, Gewinn oder Verlust, Umsatzkostenverfahren but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. PAXNFinanceResult, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [310 000] Gesamtergebnisrechnung, Gewinn oder Verlust, Umsatzkostenverfahren includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax of 85,095,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 94,278,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax that should add to 85,095,000 are comprised of the following:
+ FinanceIncome 1,549,000 + GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationRecognisedInProfitOrLoss -3,117,000 - InterestExpenseOnBankLoansAndOverdrafts 10,346,000 - InterestExpenseOnOtherFinancialLiabilities 3,078,000 + OtherFinanceIncomeCost -201,000 + ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities 100,288,000 + ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod 9,183,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [310 000] Gesamtergebnisrechnung, Gewinn oder Verlust, Umsatzkostenverfahren. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax Total Value : 85,095,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31.zip/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31/reports/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31.html 1

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520 000] Kapitalflussrechnungen, indirekte Methode includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations of 244,110,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 307,056,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations that should add to 244,110,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpenseAndImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss88,373,000 + AdjustmentsForFinanceCosts 11,875,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingPayables 325,000 + AdjustmentsForLossesGainsOnDisposalOfNoncurrentAssets 375,000 + AdjustmentsForProvisions 8,590,000 - AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod 9,183,000 + OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems 8,945,000 + ProfitLoss 62,946,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 85,095,000 + PAXNAdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInAssets 48,872,000 + PAXNAdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable 843,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520 000] Kapitalflussrechnungen, indirekte Methode. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations Total Value : 244,110,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31.zip/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31/reports/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31.html 1

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 533,034,000 reported in the network role https://www.palfinger.ag/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 549,814,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.palfinger.ag/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31.zip/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31/reports/529900IFAV83BX8O1O91-2020-12-31.html 1
